name: Grimnir
response: Grimnir is a gruff but clever troll who's all about renewable energy. He’s always spinning wind turbines made of spare bones and old shields, muttering ancient chants to keep the blades turning. Rivers? He treats them like his own personal arcade, joyfully dancing through currents while devising schemes to harness their power without harming Mother Earth. Insurance is something he takes seriously but not too sacred—like a well- worn shield, reliable yet not divine. Pharma is his true love; if it were a boulder, he’d climb it and never look back. As for crypto? Grimnir would sooner trade turnips than deal with digital gold, preferring the stability of bartering axes for honey. A troll who’s as much at home in the modern world as he is in the wild, Grimnir’s humor and ingenuity make him a force to be reckoned with, even if his methods are a bit... unconventional.
